quicksend.name: Quick Send
quicksend.usage: Opens the transaction form to send XVG.

hideinformation.name: Show/Hide personal Information
hideinformation.usage: Hides all personal data, like transactions, balance etc. and replaces them with placeholders.

lockwallet.name: Lock Wallet
lockwallet.usage: This locks your wallet, which means that you won`t be able to perform some of the offered options until you enter your password again (send XVG etc.).

region.name: Region
region.explain: This switches language to the chosen one. Choose wisely.

currency.name: Currency
currency.explain: This switches the currency your wallet is calculated for. For example: it switches currencies formats from USD to EUR

unlock.title: Unlock your wallet
unlock.info: Make sure that nobody can see your input.
unlock.wrongpass: The password you entered was incorrect.

sendPanel.title: Send XVG
sendPanel.fundwarning: Please ONLY enter a XVG address. Funds will be lost otherwise.
sendPanel.labelInfo: Enter a label for this address to add it in your addressbook.
sendPanel.walletAfterTransaction: Your wallet balance after the transaction:
sendPanel.sendWarning: Doublecheck that the wallet address is correct. Verge Currency cannot be held accountable for loss of XVG sent to wrong wallets.
sendPanel.notEnoughBalanceDescription:
You do not have enough balance to send any XVG.
Please increase you're balance.

receivePanel.title: Receive XVG
receivePanel.generate: Hit the refresh button to generate a new XVG address
receivePanel.disclaimer: Send only XVG to this deposit address. Sending any other coin or token to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.

donatePanel.title: Donate
donatePanel.donationXvgAddressHelp: Your XVG donation gets send to this address.
donatePanel.descriptionHead: At Verge we are always striving to achieve new heights and deliver products or software implementations that are requested by the community.
donatePanel.descriptionFoot: Listening to our community members and taking in feedback is not only one of the core founding principles of Verge, but it is inherent in our open-source nature.
